body.p: Customers can make input power connections directly to the input breaker or, with the Extended Bus Option, directly to the Extended Bus (). The Extended Busbar Option can accommodate double-hole compression lugs and top and bottom connections to the bus. Extended bus holes are 1/2" dia. For dual input PDUs, see
Input wiring is the responsibility of the customer or installing contractor and must comply with NEC standards.

fig.title: Main Input Circuit Breaker Power Connections
